name: 王木俊
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
瞭解基本半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC等，並介紹諸如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。也引進部分先進奈米製程技術之介紹。
schedule:
Week	Course Contents
01	Introduction to semiconductor industry
02	Introduction to IC fabrication
03	Diffusion module
04	Thin-film module
05	Thin-film module
06	Photolithography
07	Etch
08	Etch
09	Mid-term exam.
10	High-k dielectric process (I): material and integrated process
11	High-k dielectric process (I): material and integrated process
12	High-k dielectric process (II): applications
13	Strained process
14	Strained process
15	SOI process
16	New-generation logic process applications
17	3-D IC process
18	Final exam
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1.	Midterm Exam.: 20%
2.	Final Exam: 30%
3.	Quiz: 50% 

Textbook: 新世代積體電路製程技術, 2011 (by 鄭晃忠等  東華書局 02-23890906)
materials:
1. VLSI Technology by S.M. Sze 
2. ULSI Technology by C.Y. Chang and S.M. Sze
3. Introduction to Semiconductor Manufacturing Technology by Hong Xiao (中譯本: 半導體製程技術導論)
4. Semiconductor Manufacturing Technology by Michael Quirk
5. Microchip Fabrication by Peter Van Zant
6. Semiconductor Integrated Circuit Processing Technology by W.R. Runyan & K.E. Bean
7. Silicon VLSI Technology--- Fundamentals, Practice and Modeling by James D. Plummer
8. 半導體工程---先進製程與模擬 by 羅正忠等
9. ULSI製程技術 by 劉博文
10. 基礎IC技術--- 應用設計與製造 by 莊達人
11. 劉傳璽/陳進來 2006”半導體元件物理與製程整合---理論與實務”
